message: High tide warning: The Street underwater from 2pm today
Gorrell Tank car park closed Monday for resurfacing
Harbour Market this Saturday 9am–4pm — extra stalls!
Road closure: High Street between Oxford St and Harbour St, Sunday 8am-2pm for filming
Oyster Festival 2026 dates announced — July 25th to August 1st
Beach clean this Sunday 10am — meet at Tankerton Slopes
Storm warning: Please secure garden furniture and beach equipment
New parking charges in effect from 1st February — see parking page for details
Half term activities at Whitstable Castle — see events page
The Old Neptune closed for essential maintenance 3-5 March
